title: Under His Spell
description: Lynn Calloway has been living a quiet, routine life—that is, until she meets a gorgeous stranger. Drawn in by his dark, magnetic gaze, she’s instantly intrigued. She notices something different about him from the very start, but it isn’t until they spend a passionate night together that the secrets he’s been holding begin to reveal themselves in the most unexpected of ways.From the moment Takoda Chasing Horse lays eyes upon her, he’s certain that she’s the one. But before he can make her his own he will have to reveal the truth. A shape-shifter by birth, he has the ability to transform into a wolf.The passionate love they develop for one another is unbreakable, but a tragic past presents obstacles that neither is prepared for.Under His Spell is the story of two wounded souls coming together and the battles they must face to save their love.[Siren Classic: Erotic Interracial Paranormal Romance, werewolves]
author: Liz Davis
